job_purpose: Develop time-critical, safety-focused solutions in a real-time environment to prevent loss of life and catastrophic damage caused by fire.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work on preventing loss of life or injury
required_qualifications: Tertiary qualification in BEng (Electronics Engineering) or equivalent
Experience in EDA, schematic and PCB design capture
Knowledge of design theory and simulation
Strong work ethic and attention to detail
Ability to interpret requirements and work to a timeline
preferred_qualifications: Knowledge in Digital, Analogue, FPGA, Audio, embedded systems, micro-controllers
Familiarity with project release protocols and documentation
Prototyping hardware, debug, and verification experience
company_details: Australia's largest independent manufacturer of fire detection and emergency warning products, dedicated to preventing loss of life and catastrophic damage caused by fire. Part of the Halma Group, employing over 8,000 people across more than 20 countries.
